short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily search within the current website using multiple search engines.
short.zh_CN: 轻松使用多个搜索引擎在当前网站内进行搜索。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with Site Search Assistant, a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your web searches. Say goodbye to the cumbersome process of manually entering site:example.com keywords into search engines. With Site Search Assistant, you can effortlessly search the content of the current website directly from a convenient popup interface.

Key Features:

Efficient In-Site Search: Simply click the extension icon, enter your keywords, and instantly search the current website’s content.
Customizable Search Engines: Choose one or multiple search engines according to your preference, ensuring you get the most relevant results.
Context Menu Integration: Highlight any text on a webpage, right-click, and use the context menu to quickly search the selected text within the site using your preferred search engine.
User-Friendly Interface: The intuitive popup interface makes it easy to perform searches without leaving the page you’re on.
How It Works:

Activate the Extension: Click on the Site Search Assistant icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Enter Keywords: Type the keywords you want to search for within the current website.
Select Search Engines: Choose from a list of supported search engines to tailor your search experience.
View Results: Instantly see the search results without the need to manually input complex search commands.
Why Choose Site Search Assistant?

Time-Saving: Eliminate the repetitive task of typing site-specific search commands.
Convenience: Perform searches directly from the webpage you are browsing.
Flexibility: Customize your search experience with multiple search engine options.
Seamless Integration: Easily search highlighted text through the context menu, enhancing your productivity.
Get Started Today:

Install Site Search Assistant now and transform the way you search within websites. Enjoy a more efficient and user-friendly browsing experience with this indispensable tool.

Note: This extension respects your privacy and does not collect any personal data. Your search queries are processed directly through the selected search engines.
long.zh_CN:
通过 站内搜索助手，增强您的浏览体验。这款强大的 Chrome 扩展程序旨在简化您的网络搜索过程。告别每次手动在搜索引擎中输入 site:example.com keywords 的繁琐步骤。使用站内搜索助手，您可以直接从方便的弹出界面轻松搜索当前网站的内容。

主要功能：

高效的站内搜索： 只需点击扩展图标，输入关键词，即可立即搜索当前网站的内容。
可定制的搜索引擎： 根据您的偏好选择一个或多个搜索引擎，确保您获得最相关的结果。
上下文菜单集成： 在网页上高亮任何文本，右键单击，并通过上下文菜单快速搜索所选文本。
用户友好的界面： 直观的弹出界面使您无需离开当前页面即可轻松执行搜索。

使用方法：

激活扩展程序： 点击 Chrome 工具栏中的站内搜索助手图标。
输入关键词： 输入您要在当前网站中搜索的关键词。
选择搜索引擎： 从支持的搜索引擎列表中选择，定制您的搜索体验。
查看结果： 无需手动输入复杂的搜索命令，即可立即查看搜索结果。

为什么选择站内搜索助手？

节省时间： 消除重复输入特定站点搜索命令的任务。
方便： 直接从您正在浏览的网页执行搜索。
灵活性： 通过多个搜索引擎选项定制您的搜索体验。
无缝集成： 通过上下文菜单轻松搜索高亮文本，提高您的工作效率。

立即开始使用：

立即安装站内搜索助手，改变您在网站中搜索的方式。使用这款不可或缺的工具，享受更高效和用户友好的浏览体验。

注意： 此扩展程序尊重您的隐私，不收集任何个人数据。您的搜索查询直接通过所选搜索引擎处理。
